void lbann::SGD< _DistMat >::update_weight_bias_matrix ( ElMat &  WB_D,
ElMat &  WB 
) [inline, virtual]

Definition at line 82 of file lbann_optimizer_sgd.hpp.

00082                                                            {
00083 
00084       // KERAS: lr = self.lr * (1.0 / (1.0 + self.decay * self.iterations))
00085       lr = lr * (1.0 / (1.0 + decay * iterations));
00086       iterations++;
00087   
00088       // velocity
00089       // KERAS: v = self.momentum * m - lr * g  # velocity
00090       Scale(momentum, velocity);
00091       Scale(lr, WB_D); // step
00092       Axpy(-1, WB_D.Matrix(), velocity.Matrix()); // Update // TODO
00093 
00094       if(nesterov) {
00095         //KERAS: new_p = p + self.momentum * v - lr * g
00096         Copy(velocity, nesterov_ag);
00097         Scale(momentum, nesterov_ag);
00098         Axpy(-1, WB_D.Matrix(), nesterov_ag.Matrix()); // TODO
00099         Axpy(1., nesterov_ag.Matrix(), WB.Matrix()); // TODO
00100       }else {
00101         //KERAS: new_p = p + v
00102         Axpy(1., velocity.Matrix(), WB.Matrix()); // TODO
00103       }
00104 
00105     }
